mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (storeName, address, latitude, longitude, introduce, operatingDate, operatingHours, totalReview, totalRating, likes, createdAt, modifiedAt, member_username) VALUES (#{storeName}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{introduce}, #{operatingDate}, #{operatingHours}, 0, 1.0, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'test9@naver.com')
